  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, uk.co.senab.actionbarpulltorefresh.library.listeners.OnRefreshListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransportationActivity

    public abstract class ActivityForSearchingInBackground<T>
extends ActivityForSearching
    Generic class which can handle a long running search in background. Class parameter should be the class that holds the results of the background task.

    • Field Detail

      • asyncTask

        protected android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,T> asyncTask

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivityForSearchingInBackground

        public ActivityForSearchingInBackground(int layoutId,
                                java.lang.String auth,
                                int minLen)
        Initializes an activity for searching in background. The xml layout must include an error_layout and a progress_layout. A PullToRefreshLayout called ptr_layout is required if the activity should support PullToRefresh method
        Parameters:
        layoutId - Resource id of the xml layout that should be used to inflate the activity
        auth - Authority for search suggestions declared in manifest file
        minLen - Minimum text length that has to be entered by the user before a search quest can be submitted

    • Method Detail

      • onSearchInBackground

        protected abstract T onSearchInBackground()
        Gets called if search has been canceled. This method is always called from a thread that is not the UI thread, so long running operations can be invoked directly in this method. To bring the loaded results to the UI return the results and apply it in onSearchFinished(Object)

      • onSearchInBackground

        protected abstract T onSearchInBackground(java.lang.String query)
        Gets called if a search query has been entered. This method is always called from a thread that is not the UI thread, so long running operations can be invoked directly in this method. To bring the loaded results to the UI return the results and apply it in onSearchFinished(Object)
        Parameters:
        query - Query to search for
        Returns:
        Loaded results

      • onSearchFinished

        protected abstract void onSearchFinished(T result)
        Gets called after background task has finished. The background task's return value is passed to this method, but this method is called from the UI thread so you can access UI elements from here.
        Parameters:
        result - Result from background task
